answers.answer: Hi,Whether this is skin tags or not would require a clinical examination by a certified physician.Skin tags are extensions of all the layers of the skin and are caused by obesity, diabetes or other causes.Treatment options include-# Cauterization: with an electrolysis instrument# Cryosurgery (freezing)# Ligation: cutting off blood supply# Excision: with a scalpel, or other surgical instruments.http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skin_tagSince when have you noticed this? Is there any associated rash or itching etc?Let us know if you need any other information and post us about what your doctor advises.Regards.

question: I have developed something that looks like a skin tag near my eyes...what is it? and is it removable?
title: Small skin growths
